description:
<p>The Leeds Sexual Health Service has been rated as "OUTSTANDING" by the CQC in 2019 so this is a very exciting time for the service and we are looking for a forward thinking, innovative enthusiastic nurse with a passion and interest in sexual health. <br /> <br /> You need a good sense of humour, an open minded non-judgemental attitude to work in sexual health. You should be able to cope with a demanding and busy role which may have peaks and troughs. You should be able to work on your own initiative and be self-motivating and resilient. You need to have a positive approach and can do attitude and be able to positively support & manage change. We use an electronic patient record so you need IT skills. The role involves travel across Leeds to our spoke site clinics in Armley, Beeston, Burmantofts and Chapeltown and includes evening and weekend work on a rota basis.</p>
<p>It is essential the successful applicant: <br /> <br /> . Has STIF intermediate competencies and/or DFSRH or equivalent qualifications <br /> . Has at least 12 months experience working in sexual health or a related service <br /> . Is familiar with working to PGDs <br /> . Has a professional interest in this speciality <br /> . Understands current issues in the local and national sexual and public health arena <br /> . Has good communication and interpersonal skills <br /> . Is highly motivated and able to show initiative <br /> . Has experience and knowledge of safeguarding practice and procedures <br /> . Has mentoring, assessing and/or teaching skills and experience</p>
title: Senior Sexual Health Nurse
